alert.note: Alert for Mellette (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 23 at 9:59PM MDT until June 23 at 10:30PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1015 PM MDT/1115 PM CDT/ FOR NORTHWESTERN MELLETTE AND EASTERN JACKSON COUNTIES... At 959 PM MDT/1059 PM CDT/, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Capa, or 15 miles northwest of Murdo, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Mellette and eastern Jackson Counties. This includes Interstate 90 in South Dakota between Mile Markers 165 and 174. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT/100 AM CDT/ for south central and southwestern South Dakota. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
